int32 rtk_GetPortLinkStatus (uint32 *pstatus)
 Get port link status. More...
 

Detailed Description

The Network Miscellaneous Interface.

This group includes some networking API used by VoIP function.

rtk_GetPortLinkStatus
This API provide the status of ethernet port connection.
LAN Port Status: bit 0-3, WAN Port Status: bit 4
Value 1 means that the port is connected.

Function Documentation

Get port link status.
